long_description: Built for speed and stability, the Gregory Fury 24 Pack comfortably carries the essentials for light and fast hikes with an emphasis on minimalism and light weight. Breathable, flexible shoulder straps and hip belt allow unencumbered movement; contoured foam back panel with center channel ventilation provides comfortable support. Panel-loading main compartment accommodates a hydration reservoir (not included) with a sleeve and tube exit port. Elastic tube retainers let you route a drink tube down either shoulder strap. Easy-access organization abounds with a front bucket pocket, top accessory pocket, mesh side pockets and pockets on the hipbelt and shoulder straps. Attachment point makes it easy to lash on trekking poles, an ice axe or other tools. The Gregory Fury 24 Pack is made of light 210-denier and durable 420-denier nylon. Closeout.
short_description: Built for speed and stability, the Gregory Fury 24 Pack comfortably carries the essentials for light and fast hikes with an emphasis on minimalism and light weight.
